description: Vimp Architecture & Strategy Analysis - Evaluate optimal architectural path and technology stack.

userStories.title: Evaluate GIMP Source Upgrade Strategy (C++/GTK4)
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to assess the feasibility of porting existing GIMP concepts/code to a modern C++/GTK4 stack.
acceptanceCriteria: Review GIMP's current usage of GTK3 and codebase complexity
Implement a minimal 'Hello World' window using C++ and GTK4 to test setup
Document pros/cons of sticking to C++/GTK4 (legacy compat vs modern maintainability)
Verify packaging pipeline (Flatpak/Snap) for a C++ GTK4 app
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Research Alternative Languages and Select Candidates
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to evaluate modern alternatives to C++ (Zig, Rust, Go, Dart) to select the top 2 for prototyping.
acceptanceCriteria: Research GTK4 bindings maturity for Zig, Rust, Go, and Dart
Assess interop costs if using C libraries (GIMP is heavily C)
Select top 2 promising languages for further prototyping based on research
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Prototype in First Selected Alternative Language
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to test the first selected alternative language to verify its viability.
acceptanceCriteria: Create a minimal 'Canvas' prototype in the first selected language
Measure compile times and feedback loop speed
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Implemented in Rust. Cold build ~38s, Warm ~0.5s.

userStories.title: Prototype in Second Selected Alternative Language
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to test the second selected alternative language to verify its viability.

userStories.title: Assess Multiplatform & Packaging Capabilities
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to ensure the chosen stack can be easily packaged for all major targets.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify cross-compilation support for Windows from Linux for candidates
Check tooling support for generating Deb, RPM, Flatpak, and Snap
Identify any 'deal-breaker' platform limitations for each stack
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Compare Performance & Gnome HIG Compliance
userStories.description: As a product owner, I want to ensure the app feels 'native' and looks correct on Gnome.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify 'Native Performance' (startup time, rendering latency) in prototypes
Confirm access to full Gnome HIG widget set (Adwaita, etc.) in the chosen bindings
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Produce Final Recommendation
userStories.description: As the project lead, I want a consolidated report to make the final decision.
acceptanceCriteria: Create a comparison matrix (Language vs Criteria)
Write a summary recommendation (Stack + Strategy)
Update README.md with the decision
